newsArray.title: Dwayne Bravo joins Afghanistan's backroom staff for T20 World Cup 2024
newsArray.description: Former West Indies cricketer Dwayne Bravo has joined the Afghanistan cricket team's backroom staff for the T20 World Cup 2024. Bravo, the two-time T20 World Cup winner with West Indies, will be Afghanistan's bowling consultant for the global tournament in the USA and West Indies in June 2024.
